name: LinkedIn InShare button
author: Martijn Heesters - d-Media

sections.description:
Automatically add InShare buttons to your posts. It works for single pages and loops.
The plugin features an options page in which the following can be configured:

Display options:

  • Toggle hiding of button in loops

Display style:

  • Show button on top or bottom of post
  • Choose button display style (counter top,counter right,default)
  • Add breaks before and/or after the button
  • Button preview
  • Custom styling option, adds a containing div with classname which you can style in your stylesheet (new since 1.1)

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip and move the linkedin-InShare folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. After activation you can configure the plugin using the settings link or the menu
sections.faq:
Is the plugin available in Dutch ?

There is a Dutch language file included with this plugin.

Can you customize this plugin for me ?

Sure, just contact our company (http://d-media.nl) for more information
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

  • Successfuly tested plugin with WordPress version 3.9 and 3.9.1

1.2.2

  • Made sure plugin is still working in WP > 3.5
  • Cleaned up code

1.2.1

  • Fixed badly named variabele which could cause notices

1.2

  • Options page is now W3C validated
  • Updated admin page screenshot
  • Updated dutch translations
  • Added support paragraph

1.1

  • Removed urlencoding of links
  • Added custom styling functionality
  • Added Screenshot of admin panel

1.0

  • First stable release
